components/cart/totals:
{{> components/cart/coupon-codes}} {{#if settings.gift_certificates_enabled}} {{> components/cart/gift-certificates}} {{/if}}
{{> components/cart/overview}}
{{> components/cart/actions}}
components/cart/gift-certificates:
{{inject 'giftCertificateInputEmpty' (lang 'cart.gift_certificates.error')}}

{{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.gift_certificate'}} {{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.add_code'}}

{{#each cart.gift_certificates}}

{{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.label' code=code}} ({{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.remove'}}) {{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.remaining' remaining=remaining.formatted}} {{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.used' used=used.formatted}}

{{/each}}
components/cart/coupon-codes:
{{inject 'couponCodeEmptyInput' (lang 'cart.coupon_codes.error')}}

{{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.coupon_code'}} {{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.add_code'}}

{{#if cart.coupons}} {{#each cart.coupons}}

{{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.label' code=code}} {{discount.formatted}} ({{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.remove'}} / {{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.change_code'}})

{{/each}} {{/if}}
components/cart/overview:
{{lang 'cart.overview'}}

{{lang 'cart.subtotal'}} {{cart.sub_total.formatted}}
{{#if cart.gift_wrapping_cost.value}}
{{lang 'cart.gift_wrapping.title'}} {{cart.gift_wrapping_cost.formatted}}
{{/if}} {{#if cart.discount}}
{{lang 'cart.discount'}} {{cart.discount.formatted}}
{{/if}} {{#each cart.coupons}} {{#if discount.value '!==' 0}}
{{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.coupon_code'}} {{discount.formatted}}
{{/if}} {{/each}} {{#each cart.gift_certificates}}
{{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.gift_certificate'}} {{used.formatted}}
{{/each}} {{#each cart.taxes}}
{{name}} {{cost.formatted}}
{{/each}}
{{lang 'cart.shipping_calculator.title'}} {{#if cart.shipping_handling.shipping_cost}} {{#if cart.shipping_handling.shipping_cost.value "===" 0}} {{#if cart.shipping_handling.provider}} {{cart.shipping_handling.provider.description}} {{/if}} {{else}} {{cart.shipping_handling.shipping_cost.formatted}} {{/if}} {{else}} {{lang 'cart.shipping_calculator.add_info'}} {{/if}}
{{lang 'cart.total'}} {{cart.grand_total.formatted}} {{currency_selector.active_currency_code}}
components/cart/actions:
{{lang 'cart.continue_shopping'}} {{lang 'cart.check_out' amount=cart.grand_total.formatted}}
{{#if cart.additional_checkout_buttons}}
{{#each cart.additional_checkout_buttons}} {{{this}}} {{/each}}
{{/if}}
